item.description:
Let's get together again and talk about iPhone development.

In addition to the standing invitation to anyone who'd like to make a short self-introduction/presentation/pitch/plea (5-10 minutes), we'll be treated to a short demo by Tim Stephenson of RaddOnline about using the new MapKit in an iPhone app. He plans to touch on the basics of how to add a map view to a project and how to center the map on the current location. He'll also demonstrate how to geo code addresses from contacts in the Address Book and show that location on the map.


a rough outline of the meeting:

2:00 informal greetup
2:30 brief group intros, announcements, presentations
3:00 MapKit demo & ensuing discussion


Note: The room we'll be meeting in this time is different from the last. It's #304 -- up one floor and similar to that other room, but with windows! (Again: please: no sandwiches)
item.how_to_find_us: please sign in at front desk as guest, then go up to 3rd floor
item.name: NEW improved iPhone meetup #3: now featuring a MapKit demo !
